div.head: Full formal specifications
div.p: The ELTeC encoding scheme defined by this document is a TEI-conformant customization, from which user documentation, and formal RELAXNG or DTD specifications can be generated automatically.

This section contains the full schema specification from which other level-specific versions are subsequently derived. It must be converted using teitoodd to produce the compiled ODD eltec-compiled.xml which is used as a basis for the others.

remarks.p: Frequency of publication is assessed with reference to time periods of twenty years. A work which has been republished in more than four such periods, i.e. over a reasonably long time since its first appearance, is considered highly canonical. A work which appears to have been published only in a single such period is considered of low canonicity.
